details.address: 305 McGill Ave NW Suite 80, Concord, NC 28027
details.description: Luck Factory Games is the place to have fun at Gibson Mill Market in Concord! Luck Factory Games is a board game cafe featuring more than 1,000 board games of all kinds. We serve light bites, desserts, snacks and beverages (including sodas, tea, craft beers, ciders and wine) for customers to enjoy while they play and relax.

raw_data.name: Luck Factory Games
raw_data.full_address: 305 McGill Ave NW Suite 80, Concord, NC 28027, United States
raw_data.description: Luck Factory Games is the place to have fun at Gibson Mill Market in Concord! Luck Factory Games is a board game cafe featuring more than 1,000 board games of all kinds. We serve light bites, desserts, snacks and beverages (including sodas, tea, craft beers, ciders and wine) for customers to enjoy while they play and relax.
raw_data.typical_time_spent: People typically spend up to 4 hours here

reviews_data.review_text: This is the best board game shop in the greater Atlanta area!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Felix and we appreciate all you do to help us grow communities of awesome people!

reviews_data.review_text: This gem is located in Gibson Mill Market's lower level! This board game café hits all the right notes. $8 for unlimited gaming with an extensive, well-organized library. Smart touches like their colored card system for service make everyone comfortable. Staff is super helpful for newcomers, and the space is clean and well-lit. Gets busy on weekend nights with a mix of families, couples, and D&D groups. Only tip: bring a light jacket as it runs cool. Perfect spot for both casual and serious gamers - will definitely return when back in the Charlotte area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review!

reviews_data.review_text:
An amazing game store always kept tidy, with extremely friendly staff. I come here specifically for dnd. It's a bit of a drive for me but so worth it. It's the only game store I've found that run consistent dnd games and they are very newbie friendly. The first time I showed up to a game a few months ago I had no character, no dice, no experience, and I was 20 minutes late, but Steph went with it in stride giving me a character sheet, one of the other players had extra dice they let me borrow and everyone helped me through the process of learning to play. Even if everyone else is a higher level they will try to accommodate you with giving you some hits without taking damage or a special ability to help you stay in the game or they will let you know if you should prepare a higher level character if you talk to them in their discord server. That's were all the rsvps for their game nights are anyways.
There's also food and drinks. The food comes from one of the restaurants upstairs and there is a Veggie burger available for vegetarians. Lots of non-alcoholic options to drink as well. The space feels very inclusive and welcoming. I couldn't have asked for a better experience. I look forward to it every week.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Skyler! Glad you have enjoyed your time at LFG and we are honored to be a highlight in your week!

reviews_data.review_text: LFG is always a blast! Amazing selection of games. Great beers on tap that rotate regularly so you always have something new to try. The staff is so wonderful; friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable! Highly recommend jumping in on a DnD session... great for first time players or seasoned veterans! Check out the LFG website for play times and more info, but I can't recommend it enough!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the awesome review! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cool place with great people.  We've been going every other week since summer.   Good for all ages.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Kevin…and thanks for being a great customer!

reviews_data.review_text: I just love coming here with my sister on weekends and weekdays this place is just fun especially if u like DND or table top games I have been coming here for probably 2 years now great place also if I have kids.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place has almost become my second home with their welcoming staff and community. Are you looking to get into DnD or any other table top game? Then you'll easily find people there that are more than happy to help you get into it and answer questions that may come up while you have a blast.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the great review, Bryant! We are glad you love it as much as we do.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to play one of their hundreds of games of all difficulty levels with a cold beverage
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Jacob!

reviews_data.review_text: My wife and kids took me here for my birthday. At first I was a little skeptical, but had an absolute blast. Beer and snacks and board games is a great combination. Awesome opportunity to test drive games before buying them as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Glad you had a great birthday! Thanks for the awesome review.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cool place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the five star review!

reviews_data.review_text: Luck Factory Games went above and beyond in their organization and hospitality to host a corporate social for our company. Not only were they extremely kind and overly prepared, but they also made it an incredible event for everyone in attendance! Our employees raved about their space and all of the game offerings that they had available. They coordinated and ran two larger team-building events for us that were an awesome experience for our employees. We loved seeing the engagement and collaboration! They also had great food packages at a very reasonable cost for us to select from for the event. If you are considering this space for a corporate event I would highly recommend it to you on all levels! Nic, Alison, Jess, and the rest of their staff are wonderful!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Amanda! Thank you so much for the amazing review. We are so glad you enjoyed your team building event with us and it was our honor to have you spend the day with us. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: I found this gem when looking for a board game store , for my husband birthday. $8 a person the staff provides recommendations on games to play and it setup so you can easily find a game to enjoy
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Christina! Hope to see you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Tons of games to play, staff is super friendly. I even get to own the store every now and then! Hi Nick!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Thomas!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cute place, attached to a food hall. We had a great time.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for coming to see us, Meaghann! We appreciate your 5 stars!

reviews_data.review_text: I’ve been to many game stores and cafes, this is my favorite.  They way they run the cafe is great, having someone who helps teach games and get you setup with drink and snacks.  The people were friendly and there was a ton of games to pick from. Will be back again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Ryan! We’re so glad you enjoyed your visit to Luck Factory Games and appreciate your amazing review. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place for a chill night playing board games.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Jason! Thanks so much for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Love this place! So fun. I do wish they were open later on the weekends though!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Breann!

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome collection of games and different varieties, Absolutely Loved it
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the 5 stars, Madelyn!

reviews_data.review_text: Variety of games, nice and entertaining. Upstairs has plenty of food and reminds you of a food truck or mall setting with numerous options. The pizza was great from a local vendor. Parking is very adequate for the building as it was very busy after we got there. Lot of people started trickling in and the entire hall was at capacity. Come early on Saturday like 530ish as you will maybe find a seat or you can reserve one online. There is a good selection of tables and chairs but they can go quick if it's a busy night. The games range from different categories and low to difficult on the game boxes. All games are returned to the table to be checked I assume and placed back where they belong on the shelf. We will return and it is recommended for a neat getaway from the norm.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review! We hope you come back and visit Luck Factory Games soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing game selection and the staff... I drive an hour to come to this place and it's so worth it...
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Amanda!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a fun place with a helpful, kind staff.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the 5 star review and nod to the LFG team! We think they are pretty awesome too. I hope you had a great game day and we hope to have you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing place to chill and game! They have over 1,000 games to choose from and plenty of space to find a table for any size group.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kevin! We are glad you had an amazing time and hope to see y’all again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place ROCKS! I love getting together with friends here when I'm in town. They have a great selection of games, lots of comfortable varied seating, and helpful game guides. If you're into board games, this place is a great visit!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the awesome review, Nathan! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Just walked through and admired the selection of games. Can't wait to come back and play games from their library.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review. We hope you get to come back and play soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a great place for date night, family night, etc. the staff was so friendly and helpful! We had a great time trying out new games and playing favorites. Such a cool place. We’ll definitely be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the amazing review, Lindsay! We are so glad you had a great time and look forward to seeing you out again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Totally unique place to play whatever game your heart desires! If you ever have a night where you’re not sure what to do or where to go, you need to come to Lucky Factory Games. Only $5 per person and you can play board games, card games, dice games, etc!
The staff are also very helpful. They asked us questions to determine what games would be the most fun for us and provided great recommendations for games that we have never even heard of.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review! We are so glad you had a wonderful time. Come back and see us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: A super cool and creative idea! Fun for all ages and games you haven't seen in years! Snacks are delicious and offer alcohol as well!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the 5 stars and kind words! We hope you come see us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I have brought my little sister from the big brother big sister program in Cabbarus county a few times! The staff is always extremely helpful in selecting a game! Such a great idea and we always have a good time!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Charlie! Thanks so much for gaming with us. We are always glad to help our customers have a great time!

reviews_data.review_text: Nice little shop with cafe area to play board games, Ultimate Werewolf was fun to play there on their game night.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, George! We appreciate you coming to Luck Factory Games to play Werewolf.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely amazing place! The staff know the games and what to recommend based on what you’re looking for, and are ready to help answer questions. Their snack and drink selection are delicious as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Billy! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
The staff and service here are great.
Fantastic library of boardgames to play.
Wonderful sit and play areas.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Mason! Thanks for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to spend some time on a rainy day!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi David! Thanks so much for coming in today! We appreciate the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: The space is quite open and accommodating to small or large parties. The table side service for snacks/drinks was the perfect touch for an uninterrupted gaming sesh.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Gage! Thanks for the awesome review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: We stumbled upon Luck Factory in April of 2022 while visiting from the Atlanta area. My husband and I have played board and card games in the past so it sounded like a fun store to browse. That’s all we initially thought we’d do- browse. Well , we ended up spending hours here on our first visit and had such an amazing time! Nick, the owner explained the store and table reservation system and the system for asking for help with a game. If you’re not sure what kind of game you’d like and are open to suggestions he has an ingenious 3 question quiz for you to help you find that perfect game. We ended up learning Wingspan , King of Tokyo , and a few others that day and brought home a giant bag of new games.  I am not exaggerating when I say this spontaneous visit to Luck Factory  was the origin story to our current board game obsession and now we host monthly game nights back home. If we didn’t live 4 hours away we’d absolutely be VIP Members! One thing you need to know - this place is special. Since returning to the Atalanta area we’ve scoured our area for something similar and while we’ve found a handful of places absolutely nothing compares to Luck Factory and how welcome we feel there , the level of help we can get if we need it , the friendliness of everyone who works there and the HUGE library of games to play. They are very family friendly ! The places near us all are fine but each lacks something. Either they cater solely to RPGs (we couldn’t even get anyone to talk to us at one place bc we didn’t apparently fit the look of their target customers) , or another place with super friendly people and large library but no one to help you learn new games, or lastly just a big store with only one tiny shelf of games to play. So clearly Luck Factory is a gem and if you’re LUCKY enough to have this near you (or if visiting the area like we were) please go check them out. Even if you feel intimidated about learning a new game , Nick and his staff are such good teachers the way they explain things. You can learn simple or complicated games and be successful! To this day some of the games we learned at Luck Factory on that first visit and in subsequent visits since are still are go-to favorites- Wingspan, King Of Tokyo, Five Tribes , Splendor, Quacks of Quedlinburg and more. We joke that it’s both good and bad that we live 4 hours away. Seriously go . Just go. Take a friend , take your family. Meet Nick, answer his 3 questions and find your next perfect game.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Nancy! Wow - what an awesome review. THANK YOU! We look forward to your next visit and are so glad you enjoy those games as much as we do.

reviews_data.review_text: This was such a cute board game cafe! $5 per person to play any board games, and they offered a variety of canned/bottled drinks and some snacks. The hardest thing was trying to figure out what to play! There was a huge selection. Good for family nights or friends' get-togethers!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Pang! We look forward to having you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing selection of games, and the staff is very, very good at suggesting games to play and also helping your group to learn new games. They had games for every skill level. Our whole family from ages 4-38 years old had a great time! Can't wait to go back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Shelly! We appreciate you bringing your family in to play.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to hang out with any sized group! Been here on a date and for a birthday party- same amount of fun.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Love this new place to hang out and play games. Such a novel idea and the owner Nick is incredibly friendly. We love hanging out with family and I even had my last birthday celebration there. So many games and hours of fun!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Jennifer! We are so happy to celebrate your special occasions with you here at Luck Factory Games.

reviews_data.review_text: We spent hours here! Such a cute space and literally pretty much any game you could want.... Very family friendly too. We will be back
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for coming to spend your Saturday with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: My girlfriend and I had a blast here! The staff is very accommodating and friendly; we're definitely coming back to try new board games soon! It's definitely worth every penny and not to mention the snacks and the ENDLESS amount of board games and events. I appreciate that this place exists.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for coming in, Davey! We specialize in date night and are so glad you had a wonderful time.

reviews_data.review_text: My son and I were impressed with the amount of games available to play.  The staff were very friendly and helpful!  We will definitely be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Penny! Thanks so much for coming in and for leaving a great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: We really enjoyed our afternoon at Luck Factory Games. We got a try out a game that we had been thinking about adding to our collection. The staff was very knowledge and made some great suggestions for a few other games that we tried out.  This place is great for a date, but also very kid friendly. We'll be back for sure!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Justice! We look forward to having you come back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great family space with an awesome game selection
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Charlie! Thanks so much for the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: When we had first discovered this place we were in heaven. Something near our house to escape to. We were told that magic players got free entry friday and Saturday nights. So that following weekend my girlfriend and I came and had a blast playing magic with strangers. We bought beers and took home some goodies from the counter. A couple weeks later we came back with our family for another fun night. We played magic, bought beers and as we were closing our tab the total came out to nearly double what we had paid the previous time. We asked why and the lady said it was because of the entry fee. We said that we were magic players(expecting she'd give us the free pass like she had done the weeks prior) nope. She looked at us like we were crazy and trying to scam her. Keep in mind this is the same woman who told us about free magic nights.....as a customer I felt lied to, manipulated, and cheated. I had bragged to people about this place and was beyond excited to being the family. Never again. If the free Magic night was limited then say that. Pretending like it was never a thing is just plain wrong. Yall need to figure out whats real and what's not. Lying to a customer to promote your business is crossing the line.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hello! We appreciate you coming in to play at Luck Factory Games. I apologize for the misunderstanding last evening and will gladly refund your admission. Your admission should have been free and we are currently offering free Friday Night Magic until the end of 2022. If changes are made to any of our prices, we promise it will be communicated. We have no intention of lying, manipulating or misrepresenting this promotion for Magic players. This was just a mistake and we apologize.
We are working with our team to correct the response you received last night and we hope you will join us again sometime. Please email me at alison@luckfactorygames.com and I will work out the refund details for you and your group.

reviews_data.review_text: Great gaming place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Cynthia!

reviews_data.review_text: Great fun, excellent selection of games.  Awesome staff and owners.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Ricky! That’s so much for the awesome review and kind words.

reviews_data.review_text:
Fun!!!!  What a fun way to change up game day/night..

Co-Located in an old (factory) with a brewery and food places.  Once inside Tables & booths surrounded with shelves filled with games.  Thousands of games.  Board games, table games, card games.

Pay when your done. 5$ per person to play as many games as you want and for as long as you can stand it.

Bonus - check out the very large antique store located next door.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kevin! Come back and play again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place was so much fun! I've been to a couple places like this, but this was my favorite. Their system works wonderfully!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Adam! Thanks so much for the great review. We are honored to be your favorite!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is such a vibe!! I had such an amazing time, you literally cannot beat the price either. Unlimited games for $5 and they have plenty of refreshments & outstanding customer service!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Tamia! Thanks so much for coming in this weekend and for the awesome review. We are so glad you had a great experience!

reviews_data.review_text:
What a day!!  Great board game place…great selection of games to play, with a super helpful staff!  $5 cover to go, play all day.  Games for all ages and families!
Will definitely be back…convenient meet up place.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Pat! We look forward to having you join us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is simply marvelous!!  What a  great concept for getting families and friends back together again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Brett! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I run a once a month teen social D&D game here! We have a blast. Nick is incredibly accommodating of the sensory needs of the teen group and the snacks are delicious! They have a great selection of games, lots of space to play, and a wonderfully welcoming atmosphere!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for all you do with the teen social, Ginger! We look forward to seeing you again.

reviews_data.review_text: Staff is amazing! I was struggling to pick a game and am employee came up, asked a few questions, and now we have a new favorite game! Great for playing the familiar family favorites or learning a new strategy game.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Katie! Thanks for the awesome review. We are glad you had a great time. We love to share our love of games with our customers.

reviews_data.review_text: This is a great spot to find a new group to game with or to bring your friends and family for a fun evening away from home! Everyone is very welcoming. The owner is a great guy with a passion for games. Don't hesitate in checking LFG out!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review Kai!

reviews_data.review_text: My wife and I had an awesome time here visiting for the first time! Nick was super helpful with giving us recommendations for games to try and also explaining all the rules to us! We'll definitely be back with friends!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kyle! We look forward to having you back to LFG real soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Looking for something to do, bored, trying to do something fun with a group, like board games, know someone that does? This is the place to go to. So cool and chill. They're next to the brewery and they have snacks too. This place is huge, private room, storefront, Cafe area, big library of games. I was impressed by the wide variety of games they had in the library. This is part of the Gibson Mill that they are redoing/remodeling a great addition and nothing really like it nearby. They even have membership options for the whole family if you guys like family game nights. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  Plenty of parking, decent hours for now perfect place to spend on a rainy day.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Steph! Come back and see us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place has been on my bucket list for ages. We spent a solid five hours here! All staff were super accommodating. Cant wait to come again!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review Jada and thanks for gaming with us today.

reviews_data.review_text:
Fun!
Great selections for games, good old fashioned family fun with so many games and best of all, no screen time!
Family owned, small business owners, love this place. We have been two days in a row, can’t wait to come back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing concept! Lots of games in a safe space with snacks and excellent service - what more could you ask for!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Thomas! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit.

reviews_data.review_text: This was the perfect place to spend a few hours out of the 104 degree heat while waiting for a flight out of Charlotte. We played a few games we knew and tried one we had never played before. The time flew!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming in, Anne!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place for a group of friends or family's! The staff was super knowledgeable and helpful. Can't wait to come back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Emily! Thanks so much for coming in and for the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is GREAT. We've gone twice now, once for board games and once for D&D, both times were excellent. The staff is really friendly but not pushy at all, the place is comfy and clean, there are literally thousands of board games to play... I literally have no complaints.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Elyssa! Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to seeing you soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Never knew a place like this existed! We had family come in from out of town and we stumbled upon this gem! The staff is so friendly and  inviting. We will be back!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Christine! So glad you had a great time.

reviews_data.review_text:
So much fun!! The description doesn't lie, there are truly so many games. Anything we wanted to do we were able to find, plus more. We'll be back for sure!

Added bonus- the mill is a cute area with lots of fun places to drop in and out of, can't wait to see what else opens up near you all soon.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Morgan! Thanks for the great review. We are glad you had a great time.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely incredible establishment! The staff is amazing and it feels so homie. If you love games, you'll love this place.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Joshua! We look forward to gaming with you again sometime soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
This was such a fun event! I wasn't sure what to expect but I was pleasantly surprised. This is such a neat concept. You pay a small entrance fee in order to stay and play as many games as you would like. And they have PLENTY to choose from. With over 1,000 games available, you are sure to find something you enjoy. After each play, every game is checked to make sure all of the pieces are there. There are snacks and drinks available for purchase.

The owners are amazing....very friendly and accommodating. They facilitated our large group in a game of Werewolf, which was sooooo much fun.

I definitely plan to come back with my family and take advantage of some screen-free fun!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Michelle! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit and look forward to seeing you again.

reviews_data.review_text: Came here for my wife birthday. The staff, game selection, and concessions are amazing! Will for sure be a regular!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Josh! We are thrilled you had such a great time and we appreciate you giving us five stars!

reviews_data.review_text: A great place to go an spend an evening playing games. I go every Wednesday night I can to play D&D.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Matthew! We love D&D night too!

reviews_data.review_text: If you want a friendly, laid back atmosphere to spend time laughing with friends or family then. Get. Here. 🤩 Tons of games and the best part is that no one needs to argue over the rules because they will help you with that. Delicious snacks 😋 and beverages (even the adults ones) are available.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the wonderful review, Crystal! We look forward to seeing you back at Luck Factory again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: It's a neat place with lots of playable games but they have barely anything to buy and the used section for purchase was well overpriced. They had used tiny epic games, non deluxe, listed at 35 when I went there and you can get the deluxe for 35 from gamelyn or even from the game shop 4 minutes away. Basically go to play, not to buy.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Ricky! Thanks for the 4 stars. We hope next time you stop in, that you will stay and play so we can give you the full LFG experience. Our focus at Luck Factory Games is the experience, offering great selection in our library and food/beverage items. Our board game retail selection includes the titles that our customers in the board game cafe love to play the most, so that they have the opportunity to purchase the games they love. One correction to the game you referenced in your review…our gently used copy of Tiny Epic Galaxies Expansion (Non-Deluxe) is and has always been priced at $14.99+ tax. Give us a call if you would like us to hold it for you.

reviews_data.review_text: My husband and I have been frequenting this place for a while it is our favorite place. The first time we came in we were amazed by the wonderful welcoming atmosphere and the concept of the place. For a super low price you spend the day playing board games and have someone who’s has played help explain the rules. I seriously can not express how cool this place is and it’s family friendly too! Love love love this place and the people who work there! You HAVE to visit if you’re in the area!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Amy! Thanks for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Found this place through a Google search looking for something to do with my daughter and what a find! We had such a blast there exploring the "endless" games that this place has. The staff were super friendly and welcoming. They even recommended and taught us how to play a couple of games. Will definitely be back with the family.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jason! Thanks for visiting us at Luck Factory Games! We are so glad you had a wonderful time and thanks for the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: Come here to play your games. It is honestly the best environment I've played games in (this is based off my first experience). D&D on Wednesday nights was a blast! The owner is all about the experience people have from being there and having fun; seeking merchandise is secondary. Enjoy your time!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Glenn! We love D&D night too.

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome place everyone is super friendly, and they have more games than you could play in a lifetime haha.  We've been here dozen of times and will continue to go!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Shawn! We appreciate you coming to game with us.

reviews_data.review_text:
Hello from Canada!

We were looking to kill time while visiting family in Concord and we happened to stumble upon this lovely little board game cafe nested in Gibson Mill. What a pleasant surprise it was.

I need to say that we have some board game pubs here in Montreal, but none of them have games nearly as clean and as organized as LFG -- also a lot less crowded/noisy than in Montreal so it was such a nice experience!

You pay $5 per person and you have a huge selection of board games to choose from, most of which the staff can merrily explain the rules to you.
(We definitely took advantage of the "We Need Help!" card)

So anyway, we had a lot fun and discovered many great games. Thanks for bearing with us and hopefully see you next time!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Theresa! Thanks so much for coming to visit us, all the way from Canada! We spend a lot of time making sure the games are well cared for and we are thrilled that you noticed. 😊 Come back and see us again next time you come to NC.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is great! You grab a table, order snacks and/or drinks, and go pick out a game from any shelf. All the games are labeled with category, number of players, difficulty, and how long they take to play. The staff members and owner are really helpful, and they can explain how to play almost any of the games, in case you're one of the folks who likes to jump in, rather than memorizing the instruction manual. Just $5 to play, and stay as long as you like. They also have a gift shop where you can buy new and used games!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, John! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit to Luck Factory Games and look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Super friendly staff and so many games to choose from. Great fun environment
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Lisa! Thanks so much for joining us at Luck Factory Games. We appreciate your review and are glad you had a great time.

reviews_data.review_text: So fun and staff was very helpful-great selection plus access to high branch beer is great!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for coming out to Luck Factory Games! We are so glad you had a wonderful time.

reviews_data.review_text: My absolute favorite venue for low key fun in Concord. Wonderful and helpful staff, tons of engaging board games, ample food and drink. This is my go-to fun stop when I have family in town and want to have a fun time! From my kids to my mother, everyone I've brought to Luck Factory Games has had just a wonderful time.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Steve! Thank you so much for the great review. We love that you have brought your family in to play games and have a great time. Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: A great place for family board game night or a place to hang with your friends!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Kyle! We look forward to seeing you again soon. So glad you like hanging out at LFG!

reviews_data.review_text: As someone who gets overwhelmed easily, I was a little nervous picking my first game. Everyone who works here is SO helpful. They give you game suggestions based on what you’re looking for. The owner even came over to us and offered to explain the game instructions to us. This made the game 100x easier to learn! Highly recommend checking them out!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Gemma! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome place to check out.  Beer, food, and games what's not to like!  Nick was great getting us setup with our game!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the great review, Sean! We are so glad you had a good time hanging out here this weekend.

reviews_data.review_text:
Found this amazing gem of a place yesterday and couldn't have been happier! The selection of games is incredible, and the game-tenders were so welcoming and super knowledgeable! They were also appropriately attentive, with their clever card signal system!

The space is also really nice. Very clean and spacious, with a good mix of concession options, and adjacent to the new High Branch Brewing location if you want an extended beverage menu.

I was also really impressed with their plans for future events, pricing options (allowing pay-per-visit or a cancel-any-time subscription model), and Ambassador program!

On the whole, a must-visit for anyone who enjoys table games of any kind. Or just fun in general.  Definitely roll the dice on this place; you won't be disappointed! 🎲
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow! Thanks so much for the fantastic review, Blissa! We appreciate your business and look forward to gaming with you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely massive library of games to pick from with a friendly, knowledgeable staff to coach you through some of the more complex ones. Play all you want for only $5 a person. Snacks are available and you can grab a drink from the attached brewery. They also have tons of events and tournaments going on frequently.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Dawson! Thanks so much for the great review and thanks for coming in. We look forward to gaming with you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I had the best time!! Every game you can imagine is there. Super friendly & knowledgeable staff. Could seriously stay there all day. So much fun!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Katherine! Thanks so much for the great review. We are glad you had such a great time!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is awesome. Friendly knowledgeable staff. More games to play than able to count. Want to play a new game, staff will help you learn it. Will be going back. Family game night, but yet going out.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so glad you enjoy coming to Luck Factory Games! Thank you for leaving such a great review.

reviews_data.review_text: Great selection, friendly staff 👍👍
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Aaron!

reviews_data.review_text: Celebrated a birthday at luck Factory tonight. Had a fantastic time with the family playing games!staff was incredible. Love the place,wish you much success!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Patrick! Thanks so much for the great review and well wishes. We are so glad you enjoyed the birthday party!

reviews_data.review_text: Incredible space to meet with friends and game! The staff and game selection are outstanding! Highly recommend to beginners and experienced gamers. Plus you can grab a beer next door. It doesn't get any better.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Zak! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
I have now visited luck factory games several times and have thoroughly enjoyed myself.   The staff is super enthusiastic about their craft and take good care of their customers.

A.couple of cool things that make them different from other game stores.

1. They or their ambassadors will teach you the games and you can play before you buy.
2. They have around 1000 different games to play so instead of taking a chance buying a game you haven’t played., see if they have it and sample it.
3.  It’s a cafe. Eat,  drink be merry.   Where else can you enjoy a beer and a game.
4. It’s family friendly and safe.  I bright my kids and they had a blast.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review! We are so glad you and your family have had a great experience.

reviews_data.review_text: Wonderfully place! Our family had great day of gaming and cheating on our diets! 😁 There's good and delicious variety of snacks, served by a courteous and friendly staff!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Damon! So glad your family had a great day and we won’t tell anyone you cheated on your diet. 😊

reviews_data.review_text: Played several games, enjoyed some snacks.   Great service, great selection of games and a fabulous vibe.  This place is great for all ages.   I highly recommend LFG!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kim! We appreciate you spending the day with us.

reviews_data.review_text: We had a great time at Luck Factory Games!! All of the staff were super friendly and helpful! They have a great selection of food and games! We’ll definitely be back soon!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so glad you had a great time! Thanks for coming in.

raw_data.name: Luck Factory Games
raw_data.full_address: 305 McGill Ave NW Suite 80, Concord, NC 28027
raw_data.description: Luck Factory Games is the place to have fun at Gibson Mill Market in Concord! Luck Factory Games is a board game cafe featuring more than 1,000 board games of all kinds. We serve light bites, desserts, snacks and beverages (including sodas, tea, craft beers, ciders and wine) for customers to enjoy while they play and relax.
raw_data.typical_time_spent: People typically spend up to 4 hours here

reviews_data.review_text: This is the best board game shop in the greater Atlanta area!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Felix and we appreciate all you do to help us grow communities of awesome people!

reviews_data.review_text: This gem is located in Gibson Mill Market's lower level! This board game café hits all the right notes. $8 for unlimited gaming with an extensive, well-organized library. Smart touches like their colored card system for service make everyone comfortable. Staff is super helpful for newcomers, and the space is clean and well-lit. Gets busy on weekend nights with a mix of families, couples, and D&D groups. Only tip: bring a light jacket as it runs cool. Perfect spot for both casual and serious gamers - will definitely return when back in the Charlotte area.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review!

reviews_data.review_text:
An amazing game store always kept tidy, with extremely friendly staff. I come here specifically for dnd. It's a bit of a drive for me but so worth it. It's the only game store I've found that run consistent dnd games and they are very newbie friendly. The first time I showed up to a game a few months ago I had no character, no dice, no experience, and I was 20 minutes late, but Steph went with it in stride giving me a character sheet, one of the other players had extra dice they let me borrow and everyone helped me through the process of learning to play. Even if everyone else is a higher level they will try to accommodate you with giving you some hits without taking damage or a special ability to help you stay in the game or they will let you know if you should prepare a higher level character if you talk to them in their discord server. That's were all the rsvps for their game nights are anyways.
There's also food and drinks. The food comes from one of the restaurants upstairs and there is a Veggie burger available for vegetarians. Lots of non-alcoholic options to drink as well. The space feels very inclusive and welcoming. I couldn't have asked for a better experience. I look forward to it every week.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Skyler! Glad you have enjoyed your time at LFG and we are honored to be a highlight in your week!

reviews_data.review_text: LFG is always a blast! Amazing selection of games. Great beers on tap that rotate regularly so you always have something new to try. The staff is so wonderful; friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable! Highly recommend jumping in on a DnD session... great for first time players or seasoned veterans! Check out the LFG website for play times and more info, but I can't recommend it enough!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the awesome review! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cool place with great people.  We've been going every other week since summer.   Good for all ages.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Kevin…and thanks for being a great customer!

reviews_data.review_text: I just love coming here with my sister on weekends and weekdays this place is just fun especially if u like DND or table top games I have been coming here for probably 2 years now great place also if I have kids.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place has almost become my second home with their welcoming staff and community. Are you looking to get into DnD or any other table top game? Then you'll easily find people there that are more than happy to help you get into it and answer questions that may come up while you have a blast.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the great review, Bryant! We are glad you love it as much as we do.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to play one of their hundreds of games of all difficulty levels with a cold beverage
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Jacob!

reviews_data.review_text: My wife and kids took me here for my birthday. At first I was a little skeptical, but had an absolute blast. Beer and snacks and board games is a great combination. Awesome opportunity to test drive games before buying them as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Glad you had a great birthday! Thanks for the awesome review.

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cool place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the five star review!

reviews_data.review_text: Luck Factory Games went above and beyond in their organization and hospitality to host a corporate social for our company. Not only were they extremely kind and overly prepared, but they also made it an incredible event for everyone in attendance! Our employees raved about their space and all of the game offerings that they had available. They coordinated and ran two larger team-building events for us that were an awesome experience for our employees. We loved seeing the engagement and collaboration! They also had great food packages at a very reasonable cost for us to select from for the event. If you are considering this space for a corporate event I would highly recommend it to you on all levels! Nic, Alison, Jess, and the rest of their staff are wonderful!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Amanda! Thank you so much for the amazing review. We are so glad you enjoyed your team building event with us and it was our honor to have you spend the day with us. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: I found this gem when looking for a board game store , for my husband birthday. $8 a person the staff provides recommendations on games to play and it setup so you can easily find a game to enjoy
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Christina! Hope to see you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Tons of games to play, staff is super friendly. I even get to own the store every now and then! Hi Nick!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Thomas!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a cute place, attached to a food hall. We had a great time.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for coming to see us, Meaghann! We appreciate your 5 stars!

reviews_data.review_text: I’ve been to many game stores and cafes, this is my favorite.  They way they run the cafe is great, having someone who helps teach games and get you setup with drink and snacks.  The people were friendly and there was a ton of games to pick from. Will be back again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Ryan! We’re so glad you enjoyed your visit to Luck Factory Games and appreciate your amazing review. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place for a chill night playing board games.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Jason! Thanks so much for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Love this place! So fun. I do wish they were open later on the weekends though!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Breann!

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome collection of games and different varieties, Absolutely Loved it
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the 5 stars, Madelyn!

reviews_data.review_text: Variety of games, nice and entertaining. Upstairs has plenty of food and reminds you of a food truck or mall setting with numerous options. The pizza was great from a local vendor. Parking is very adequate for the building as it was very busy after we got there. Lot of people started trickling in and the entire hall was at capacity. Come early on Saturday like 530ish as you will maybe find a seat or you can reserve one online. There is a good selection of tables and chairs but they can go quick if it's a busy night. The games range from different categories and low to difficult on the game boxes. All games are returned to the table to be checked I assume and placed back where they belong on the shelf. We will return and it is recommended for a neat getaway from the norm.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review! We hope you come back and visit Luck Factory Games soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing game selection and the staff... I drive an hour to come to this place and it's so worth it...
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Amanda!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a fun place with a helpful, kind staff.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the 5 star review and nod to the LFG team! We think they are pretty awesome too. I hope you had a great game day and we hope to have you back soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing place to chill and game! They have over 1,000 games to choose from and plenty of space to find a table for any size group.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kevin! We are glad you had an amazing time and hope to see y’all again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place ROCKS! I love getting together with friends here when I'm in town. They have a great selection of games, lots of comfortable varied seating, and helpful game guides. If you're into board games, this place is a great visit!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the awesome review, Nathan! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Just walked through and admired the selection of games. Can't wait to come back and play games from their library.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review. We hope you get to come back and play soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Such a great place for date night, family night, etc. the staff was so friendly and helpful! We had a great time trying out new games and playing favorites. Such a cool place. We’ll definitely be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the amazing review, Lindsay! We are so glad you had a great time and look forward to seeing you out again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
Totally unique place to play whatever game your heart desires! If you ever have a night where you’re not sure what to do or where to go, you need to come to Lucky Factory Games. Only $5 per person and you can play board games, card games, dice games, etc!
The staff are also very helpful. They asked us questions to determine what games would be the most fun for us and provided great recommendations for games that we have never even heard of.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review! We are so glad you had a wonderful time. Come back and see us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: A super cool and creative idea! Fun for all ages and games you haven't seen in years! Snacks are delicious and offer alcohol as well!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the 5 stars and kind words! We hope you come see us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I have brought my little sister from the big brother big sister program in Cabbarus county a few times! The staff is always extremely helpful in selecting a game! Such a great idea and we always have a good time!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Charlie! Thanks so much for gaming with us. We are always glad to help our customers have a great time!

reviews_data.review_text: Nice little shop with cafe area to play board games, Ultimate Werewolf was fun to play there on their game night.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, George! We appreciate you coming to Luck Factory Games to play Werewolf.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely amazing place! The staff know the games and what to recommend based on what you’re looking for, and are ready to help answer questions. Their snack and drink selection are delicious as well.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Billy! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
The staff and service here are great.
Fantastic library of boardgames to play.
Wonderful sit and play areas.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Mason! Thanks for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to spend some time on a rainy day!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi David! Thanks so much for coming in today! We appreciate the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: The space is quite open and accommodating to small or large parties. The table side service for snacks/drinks was the perfect touch for an uninterrupted gaming sesh.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Gage! Thanks for the awesome review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: We stumbled upon Luck Factory in April of 2022 while visiting from the Atlanta area. My husband and I have played board and card games in the past so it sounded like a fun store to browse. That’s all we initially thought we’d do- browse. Well , we ended up spending hours here on our first visit and had such an amazing time! Nick, the owner explained the store and table reservation system and the system for asking for help with a game. If you’re not sure what kind of game you’d like and are open to suggestions he has an ingenious 3 question quiz for you to help you find that perfect game. We ended up learning Wingspan , King of Tokyo , and a few others that day and brought home a giant bag of new games.  I am not exaggerating when I say this spontaneous visit to Luck Factory  was the origin story to our current board game obsession and now we host monthly game nights back home. If we didn’t live 4 hours away we’d absolutely be VIP Members! One thing you need to know - this place is special. Since returning to the Atalanta area we’ve scoured our area for something similar and while we’ve found a handful of places absolutely nothing compares to Luck Factory and how welcome we feel there , the level of help we can get if we need it , the friendliness of everyone who works there and the HUGE library of games to play. They are very family friendly ! The places near us all are fine but each lacks something. Either they cater solely to RPGs (we couldn’t even get anyone to talk to us at one place bc we didn’t apparently fit the look of their target customers) , or another place with super friendly people and large library but no one to help you learn new games, or lastly just a big store with only one tiny shelf of games to play. So clearly Luck Factory is a gem and if you’re LUCKY enough to have this near you (or if visiting the area like we were) please go check them out. Even if you feel intimidated about learning a new game , Nick and his staff are such good teachers the way they explain things. You can learn simple or complicated games and be successful! To this day some of the games we learned at Luck Factory on that first visit and in subsequent visits since are still are go-to favorites- Wingspan, King Of Tokyo, Five Tribes , Splendor, Quacks of Quedlinburg and more. We joke that it’s both good and bad that we live 4 hours away. Seriously go . Just go. Take a friend , take your family. Meet Nick, answer his 3 questions and find your next perfect game.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Nancy! Wow - what an awesome review. THANK YOU! We look forward to your next visit and are so glad you enjoy those games as much as we do.

reviews_data.review_text: This was such a cute board game cafe! $5 per person to play any board games, and they offered a variety of canned/bottled drinks and some snacks. The hardest thing was trying to figure out what to play! There was a huge selection. Good for family nights or friends' get-togethers!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Pang! We look forward to having you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing selection of games, and the staff is very, very good at suggesting games to play and also helping your group to learn new games. They had games for every skill level. Our whole family from ages 4-38 years old had a great time! Can't wait to go back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Shelly! We appreciate you bringing your family in to play.

reviews_data.review_text: Great place to hang out with any sized group! Been here on a date and for a birthday party- same amount of fun.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Love this new place to hang out and play games. Such a novel idea and the owner Nick is incredibly friendly. We love hanging out with family and I even had my last birthday celebration there. So many games and hours of fun!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the awesome review, Jennifer! We are so happy to celebrate your special occasions with you here at Luck Factory Games.

reviews_data.review_text: We spent hours here! Such a cute space and literally pretty much any game you could want.... Very family friendly too. We will be back
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for coming to spend your Saturday with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: My girlfriend and I had a blast here! The staff is very accommodating and friendly; we're definitely coming back to try new board games soon! It's definitely worth every penny and not to mention the snacks and the ENDLESS amount of board games and events. I appreciate that this place exists.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for coming in, Davey! We specialize in date night and are so glad you had a wonderful time.

reviews_data.review_text: My son and I were impressed with the amount of games available to play.  The staff were very friendly and helpful!  We will definitely be back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Penny! Thanks so much for coming in and for leaving a great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: We really enjoyed our afternoon at Luck Factory Games. We got a try out a game that we had been thinking about adding to our collection. The staff was very knowledge and made some great suggestions for a few other games that we tried out.  This place is great for a date, but also very kid friendly. We'll be back for sure!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Justice! We look forward to having you come back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Great family space with an awesome game selection
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Charlie! Thanks so much for the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: When we had first discovered this place we were in heaven. Something near our house to escape to. We were told that magic players got free entry friday and Saturday nights. So that following weekend my girlfriend and I came and had a blast playing magic with strangers. We bought beers and took home some goodies from the counter. A couple weeks later we came back with our family for another fun night. We played magic, bought beers and as we were closing our tab the total came out to nearly double what we had paid the previous time. We asked why and the lady said it was because of the entry fee. We said that we were magic players(expecting she'd give us the free pass like she had done the weeks prior) nope. She looked at us like we were crazy and trying to scam her. Keep in mind this is the same woman who told us about free magic nights.....as a customer I felt lied to, manipulated, and cheated. I had bragged to people about this place and was beyond excited to being the family. Never again. If the free Magic night was limited then say that. Pretending like it was never a thing is just plain wrong. Yall need to figure out whats real and what's not. Lying to a customer to promote your business is crossing the line.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hello! We appreciate you coming in to play at Luck Factory Games. I apologize for the misunderstanding last evening and will gladly refund your admission. Your admission should have been free and we are currently offering free Friday Night Magic until the end of 2022. If changes are made to any of our prices, we promise it will be communicated. We have no intention of lying, manipulating or misrepresenting this promotion for Magic players. This was just a mistake and we apologize.
We are working with our team to correct the response you received last night and we hope you will join us again sometime. Please email me at alison@luckfactorygames.com and I will work out the refund details for you and your group.

reviews_data.review_text: Great gaming place
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Cynthia!

reviews_data.review_text: Great fun, excellent selection of games.  Awesome staff and owners.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Ricky! That’s so much for the awesome review and kind words.

reviews_data.review_text:
Fun!!!!  What a fun way to change up game day/night..

Co-Located in an old (factory) with a brewery and food places.  Once inside Tables & booths surrounded with shelves filled with games.  Thousands of games.  Board games, table games, card games.

Pay when your done. 5$ per person to play as many games as you want and for as long as you can stand it.

Bonus - check out the very large antique store located next door.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kevin! Come back and play again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place was so much fun! I've been to a couple places like this, but this was my favorite. Their system works wonderfully!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Adam! Thanks so much for the great review. We are honored to be your favorite!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is such a vibe!! I had such an amazing time, you literally cannot beat the price either. Unlimited games for $5 and they have plenty of refreshments & outstanding customer service!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Tamia! Thanks so much for coming in this weekend and for the awesome review. We are so glad you had a great experience!

reviews_data.review_text:
What a day!!  Great board game place…great selection of games to play, with a super helpful staff!  $5 cover to go, play all day.  Games for all ages and families!
Will definitely be back…convenient meet up place.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Pat! We look forward to having you join us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is simply marvelous!!  What a  great concept for getting families and friends back together again!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Brett! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I run a once a month teen social D&D game here! We have a blast. Nick is incredibly accommodating of the sensory needs of the teen group and the snacks are delicious! They have a great selection of games, lots of space to play, and a wonderfully welcoming atmosphere!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for all you do with the teen social, Ginger! We look forward to seeing you again.

reviews_data.review_text: Staff is amazing! I was struggling to pick a game and am employee came up, asked a few questions, and now we have a new favorite game! Great for playing the familiar family favorites or learning a new strategy game.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Katie! Thanks for the awesome review. We are glad you had a great time. We love to share our love of games with our customers.

reviews_data.review_text: This is a great spot to find a new group to game with or to bring your friends and family for a fun evening away from home! Everyone is very welcoming. The owner is a great guy with a passion for games. Don't hesitate in checking LFG out!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review Kai!

reviews_data.review_text: My wife and I had an awesome time here visiting for the first time! Nick was super helpful with giving us recommendations for games to try and also explaining all the rules to us! We'll definitely be back with friends!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kyle! We look forward to having you back to LFG real soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Looking for something to do, bored, trying to do something fun with a group, like board games, know someone that does? This is the place to go to. So cool and chill. They're next to the brewery and they have snacks too. This place is huge, private room, storefront, Cafe area, big library of games. I was impressed by the wide variety of games they had in the library. This is part of the Gibson Mill that they are redoing/remodeling a great addition and nothing really like it nearby. They even have membership options for the whole family if you guys like family game nights. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  Plenty of parking, decent hours for now perfect place to spend on a rainy day.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Steph! Come back and see us again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place has been on my bucket list for ages. We spent a solid five hours here! All staff were super accommodating. Cant wait to come again!!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review Jada and thanks for gaming with us today.

reviews_data.review_text:
Fun!
Great selections for games, good old fashioned family fun with so many games and best of all, no screen time!
Family owned, small business owners, love this place. We have been two days in a row, can’t wait to come back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Amazing concept! Lots of games in a safe space with snacks and excellent service - what more could you ask for!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Thomas! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit.

reviews_data.review_text: This was the perfect place to spend a few hours out of the 104 degree heat while waiting for a flight out of Charlotte. We played a few games we knew and tried one we had never played before. The time flew!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for coming in, Anne!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place for a group of friends or family's! The staff was super knowledgeable and helpful. Can't wait to come back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Emily! Thanks so much for coming in and for the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is GREAT. We've gone twice now, once for board games and once for D&D, both times were excellent. The staff is really friendly but not pushy at all, the place is comfy and clean, there are literally thousands of board games to play... I literally have no complaints.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Elyssa! Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to seeing you soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Never knew a place like this existed! We had family come in from out of town and we stumbled upon this gem! The staff is so friendly and  inviting. We will be back!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Christine! So glad you had a great time.

reviews_data.review_text:
So much fun!! The description doesn't lie, there are truly so many games. Anything we wanted to do we were able to find, plus more. We'll be back for sure!

Added bonus- the mill is a cute area with lots of fun places to drop in and out of, can't wait to see what else opens up near you all soon.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Morgan! Thanks for the great review. We are glad you had a great time.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely incredible establishment! The staff is amazing and it feels so homie. If you love games, you'll love this place.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Joshua! We look forward to gaming with you again sometime soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
This was such a fun event! I wasn't sure what to expect but I was pleasantly surprised. This is such a neat concept. You pay a small entrance fee in order to stay and play as many games as you would like. And they have PLENTY to choose from. With over 1,000 games available, you are sure to find something you enjoy. After each play, every game is checked to make sure all of the pieces are there. There are snacks and drinks available for purchase.

The owners are amazing....very friendly and accommodating. They facilitated our large group in a game of Werewolf, which was sooooo much fun.

I definitely plan to come back with my family and take advantage of some screen-free fun!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Michelle! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit and look forward to seeing you again.

reviews_data.review_text: Came here for my wife birthday. The staff, game selection, and concessions are amazing! Will for sure be a regular!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Josh! We are thrilled you had such a great time and we appreciate you giving us five stars!

reviews_data.review_text: A great place to go an spend an evening playing games. I go every Wednesday night I can to play D&D.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Matthew! We love D&D night too!

reviews_data.review_text: If you want a friendly, laid back atmosphere to spend time laughing with friends or family then. Get. Here. 🤩 Tons of games and the best part is that no one needs to argue over the rules because they will help you with that. Delicious snacks 😋 and beverages (even the adults ones) are available.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the wonderful review, Crystal! We look forward to seeing you back at Luck Factory again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: It's a neat place with lots of playable games but they have barely anything to buy and the used section for purchase was well overpriced. They had used tiny epic games, non deluxe, listed at 35 when I went there and you can get the deluxe for 35 from gamelyn or even from the game shop 4 minutes away. Basically go to play, not to buy.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Ricky! Thanks for the 4 stars. We hope next time you stop in, that you will stay and play so we can give you the full LFG experience. Our focus at Luck Factory Games is the experience, offering great selection in our library and food/beverage items. Our board game retail selection includes the titles that our customers in the board game cafe love to play the most, so that they have the opportunity to purchase the games they love. One correction to the game you referenced in your review…our gently used copy of Tiny Epic Galaxies Expansion (Non-Deluxe) is and has always been priced at $14.99+ tax. Give us a call if you would like us to hold it for you.

reviews_data.review_text: My husband and I have been frequenting this place for a while it is our favorite place. The first time we came in we were amazed by the wonderful welcoming atmosphere and the concept of the place. For a super low price you spend the day playing board games and have someone who’s has played help explain the rules. I seriously can not express how cool this place is and it’s family friendly too! Love love love this place and the people who work there! You HAVE to visit if you’re in the area!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Amy! Thanks for the great review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Found this place through a Google search looking for something to do with my daughter and what a find! We had such a blast there exploring the "endless" games that this place has. The staff were super friendly and welcoming. They even recommended and taught us how to play a couple of games. Will definitely be back with the family.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jason! Thanks for visiting us at Luck Factory Games! We are so glad you had a wonderful time and thanks for the great review.

reviews_data.review_text: Come here to play your games. It is honestly the best environment I've played games in (this is based off my first experience). D&D on Wednesday nights was a blast! The owner is all about the experience people have from being there and having fun; seeking merchandise is secondary. Enjoy your time!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Glenn! We love D&D night too.

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome place everyone is super friendly, and they have more games than you could play in a lifetime haha.  We've been here dozen of times and will continue to go!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Shawn! We appreciate you coming to game with us.

reviews_data.review_text:
Hello from Canada!

We were looking to kill time while visiting family in Concord and we happened to stumble upon this lovely little board game cafe nested in Gibson Mill. What a pleasant surprise it was.

I need to say that we have some board game pubs here in Montreal, but none of them have games nearly as clean and as organized as LFG -- also a lot less crowded/noisy than in Montreal so it was such a nice experience!

You pay $5 per person and you have a huge selection of board games to choose from, most of which the staff can merrily explain the rules to you.
(We definitely took advantage of the "We Need Help!" card)

So anyway, we had a lot fun and discovered many great games. Thanks for bearing with us and hopefully see you next time!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Theresa! Thanks so much for coming to visit us, all the way from Canada! We spend a lot of time making sure the games are well cared for and we are thrilled that you noticed. 😊 Come back and see us again next time you come to NC.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is great! You grab a table, order snacks and/or drinks, and go pick out a game from any shelf. All the games are labeled with category, number of players, difficulty, and how long they take to play. The staff members and owner are really helpful, and they can explain how to play almost any of the games, in case you're one of the folks who likes to jump in, rather than memorizing the instruction manual. Just $5 to play, and stay as long as you like. They also have a gift shop where you can buy new and used games!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, John! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit to Luck Factory Games and look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Super friendly staff and so many games to choose from. Great fun environment
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Lisa! Thanks so much for joining us at Luck Factory Games. We appreciate your review and are glad you had a great time.

reviews_data.review_text: So fun and staff was very helpful-great selection plus access to high branch beer is great!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for coming out to Luck Factory Games! We are so glad you had a wonderful time.

reviews_data.review_text: My absolute favorite venue for low key fun in Concord. Wonderful and helpful staff, tons of engaging board games, ample food and drink. This is my go-to fun stop when I have family in town and want to have a fun time! From my kids to my mother, everyone I've brought to Luck Factory Games has had just a wonderful time.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Steve! Thank you so much for the great review. We love that you have brought your family in to play games and have a great time. Hope to see you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: A great place for family board game night or a place to hang with your friends!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the review, Kyle! We look forward to seeing you again soon. So glad you like hanging out at LFG!

reviews_data.review_text: As someone who gets overwhelmed easily, I was a little nervous picking my first game. Everyone who works here is SO helpful. They give you game suggestions based on what you’re looking for. The owner even came over to us and offered to explain the game instructions to us. This made the game 100x easier to learn! Highly recommend checking them out!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Gemma! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Awesome place to check out.  Beer, food, and games what's not to like!  Nick was great getting us setup with our game!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the great review, Sean! We are so glad you had a good time hanging out here this weekend.

reviews_data.review_text:
Found this amazing gem of a place yesterday and couldn't have been happier! The selection of games is incredible, and the game-tenders were so welcoming and super knowledgeable! They were also appropriately attentive, with their clever card signal system!

The space is also really nice. Very clean and spacious, with a good mix of concession options, and adjacent to the new High Branch Brewing location if you want an extended beverage menu.

I was also really impressed with their plans for future events, pricing options (allowing pay-per-visit or a cancel-any-time subscription model), and Ambassador program!

On the whole, a must-visit for anyone who enjoys table games of any kind. Or just fun in general.  Definitely roll the dice on this place; you won't be disappointed! 🎲
reviews_data.owner_answer: Wow! Thanks so much for the fantastic review, Blissa! We appreciate your business and look forward to gaming with you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely massive library of games to pick from with a friendly, knowledgeable staff to coach you through some of the more complex ones. Play all you want for only $5 a person. Snacks are available and you can grab a drink from the attached brewery. They also have tons of events and tournaments going on frequently.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Dawson! Thanks so much for the great review and thanks for coming in. We look forward to gaming with you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: I had the best time!! Every game you can imagine is there. Super friendly & knowledgeable staff. Could seriously stay there all day. So much fun!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hey Katherine! Thanks so much for the great review. We are glad you had such a great time!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is awesome. Friendly knowledgeable staff. More games to play than able to count. Want to play a new game, staff will help you learn it. Will be going back. Family game night, but yet going out.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so glad you enjoy coming to Luck Factory Games! Thank you for leaving such a great review.

reviews_data.review_text: Great selection, friendly staff 👍👍
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Aaron!

reviews_data.review_text: Celebrated a birthday at luck Factory tonight. Had a fantastic time with the family playing games!staff was incredible. Love the place,wish you much success!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Patrick! Thanks so much for the great review and well wishes. We are so glad you enjoyed the birthday party!

reviews_data.review_text: Incredible space to meet with friends and game! The staff and game selection are outstanding! Highly recommend to beginners and experienced gamers. Plus you can grab a beer next door. It doesn't get any better.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Zak! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
I have now visited luck factory games several times and have thoroughly enjoyed myself.   The staff is super enthusiastic about their craft and take good care of their customers.

A.couple of cool things that make them different from other game stores.

1. They or their ambassadors will teach you the games and you can play before you buy.
2. They have around 1000 different games to play so instead of taking a chance buying a game you haven’t played., see if they have it and sample it.
3.  It’s a cafe. Eat,  drink be merry.   Where else can you enjoy a beer and a game.
4. It’s family friendly and safe.  I bright my kids and they had a blast.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review! We are so glad you and your family have had a great experience.

reviews_data.review_text: Wonderfully place! Our family had great day of gaming and cheating on our diets! 😁 There's good and delicious variety of snacks, served by a courteous and friendly staff!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much for the great review, Damon! So glad your family had a great day and we won’t tell anyone you cheated on your diet. 😊

reviews_data.review_text: Played several games, enjoyed some snacks.   Great service, great selection of games and a fabulous vibe.  This place is great for all ages.   I highly recommend LFG!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the great review, Kim! We appreciate you spending the day with us.

reviews_data.review_text: We had a great time at Luck Factory Games!! All of the staff were super friendly and helpful! They have a great selection of food and games! We’ll definitely be back soon!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so glad you had a great time! Thanks for coming in.
